detailsOfAchievement: Being a national level Foundation, the organization has no geographical boundary or limitation as far as achieving the objectives it has for benefiting the people in the country. The past activities have penetrated into various States mostly in all parts of the country and thus the organizations profile has achieved an all India character. These activities have enable the organization to build up rapport and coordination with State level institutions and departments in all parts of the Country through close collaboration and liaison. Various activities are being implemented for welfare of the people with a particular emphasis on student community and poor sections, education, counseling and referral for the prevention and control of HIV/AIDS and Cancer, National Student Safety Programme, National Blood Donation Volunteer Programme and financial support in the form of Medical Aid to the poor and deprived people all over the country. During the year under report, the organization has been able to cover large number of educational institutions spread all over the Country particularly the States of Uttar Pradesh, Uttarakhand, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, Punjab, Haryana, Tamil Nadu, Chattishgarh, Jharkhand, Orissa, Gujrat & Andhra Pradesh and north eastern States. Under which more than one million students could be targeted to receive the benefits of the activities. In order to further help in the effective and wide spread dissemination of information and implementation of various programme the foundation has established counseling cum information centers in various important cities and district towns of all these States. These centers continue to operate and provide invaluable support to the students and general mass.
